attributes.action: Stop Multiple Benefit for Multiple Wives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To remove the ridiculous rule that allows Muslim men living in a harem being able to claim additional benefits for all their wives.  It is illegal to have multiples wives in this country and additional benefits should not be allowable for illegal marriages.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
